entry.title: Neocities Tutorials
entry.content:
Learn how to make websites from scratch. A collection of introductions to HTML, CSS, and even some frameworks and static site generators.

If you have a Neocities account, you can also take their Neocities HTML course.

entry.title: Indie Web Camp
entry.content: A collection of resources for independent web builders, including a wiki for some common terms, a chat community, and lots of resources for indieweb technology.

entry.title: Marginalia Search
entry.content:
A less noisy, text-focused search engine.

It is a search engine, designed to help you find what you didn’t even know you were looking for. If you search for “Plato”, you might for example end up at the Canterbury Tales. Go looking for the Canterbury Tales, and you may stumble upon Neil Gaiman’s blog. (About)
